name: Shut Up and Come With Us!!
text: [Counter] Look at the top 5 cards of your deck and put up to one cost 3 or less {Animal} type character into play. Then, place the rest on the bottom of your deck in any order.

effect.text: Look at the top 5 cards of your deck and put up to one cost 3 or less {Animal} type character into play. Then, place the rest on the bottom of your deck in any order.
